how do i reinstall xserver?: cry0x:i cant boot into windows cause it doesnt seem to detect my screen or something and i have tryed kde and reconfigureing the xorg.conf with no luck
i guess... You change your session to "Failsafe Terminal" on GDM, run "sudo apt-get remove --purge xserver" and then "sudo apt-get install xserver" 0_0'
depending on the issue, of course...
